title: FS:PSA graded T206's Cleveland players (lotsa scans)
author: BasherBoy

posts.post_title: FS:PSA graded T206's Cleveland players (lotsa scans)
posts.post_content:
I've had to make some decisions and narrow my collecting focus so I think it's time to sell some things.  I've picked up a few Cleveland T206's where I could for my team set collection but I think I need to sell them now to help fund some other projects.  No super rare backs, but still some nice cards.  If interested, please PM or email.

T206 GLENN LIEBHARDT (BROWN HINDU BACK) PSA 1 $360
[IMG]http://i75.photobucket.com/albums/i283/ajlee72/Old%20School%20Indians/T206-LIEBHARDT-HINDU-1.jpg[/IMG]

just fyi, I have read all the PM's up through Marty's.  I'm working on pricing/scans (should have been smart and done it before starting the thread)  Anyway, once prices are posted it will be first come, first serve.  If there would happen to be a particular card that you really need, shoot me an offer.  Prices posted will be check/cash/money order/paypal personal.  I'm more than happy to accept regular paypal, but it will be a tick more.  For simplicity, prices include shipping.  Just as a side note, I would also trade for high end graded Indians/Browns that I need for my sets (50's thru 80's)

thanks for the interest!

**EDIT**
prices/pics added to all.  If you have things to trade that I might like let me know!
everything priced and with pics, some pics aren't the best...I can try to get better if you really need it.
pm sent will take the two you quoted me  thanks  Bill
cleaned up my posts, removed everything that sold (I think).  Any interest before the rest make their way to ebay?
bump up for the weekend, list updated.
